Description.Text: The Hilton Garden Inn Tribeca Hotel is located in the most stylish, sophisticated downtown New York neighborhood, Tribeca. It is near the luxury boutiques of Soho spectacular nightlife and award winning restaurants.

• Canal Street - 0.1 miles • Children's Museum of Arts - 0.38 miles • Wall Street - 0.45 miles • South Street Seaport - 0.94 miles • National Sports Museum - 1.19 miles • New York City Police Museum - 1.21 miles • Statue of Liberty Ellis Island - 1.24 miles • Chelsea Piers - 1.47 miles • Empire State Building - 2.73 miles • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 4.57 miles • Central Park Zoo -5.52 miles

The hotel features 151 rooms, each equipped with a spacious work desk and high-speed Internet access. A hospitality center in each room includes microwave, refrigerator, and coffeemaker. Irons and ironing boards and hair dryers are standard in all rooms. The hotel has a high-speed wireless business center that is complimentary to guests and is accessible 24-hours a day.

This modern Hilton Garden Inn is in trendsetting Tribeca, home to numerous movie stars and other celebrities. Shopping in the area ranges from rock-bottom bargains to exclusive designer boutiques. And dining options run the gamut from classic New York diners and delis to world-class restaurants such as Nobu and Bouley. The hotel itself offers an acclaimed restaurant: Bar Artisanal, which also provides room service. The Great American Grill, serving cooked-to-order breakfast, is also on site.

From La Guardia Airport: Grand Central Parkway west to Brooklyn Queens expressway south. Take the Brooklyn Queens expressway to Williamsburg bridge, slight left at Delancey St, L at Bowery, Rt at Canal, L on Varick, L on Beach St, continue on 6th Ave hotel on left.
From John F. Kennedy International Airport: JFK Expy N to I-678 N/Van Wyck Expy N Merge onto I-495 W to I-278 toward Brooklyn,slight left @ Williamsburg Bridge, left at Delancey, Left at Bowery, make rt at Canal St, left on Varick, Left on Beach to 6th Ave Hotel on Left on 6th & York.

The restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner with room service available. Great American Grill - Cooked-to-order breakfast served daily. Bar Artisanal - Chic French bistro created by Chef Terrance Brennan. Menu highlights: Fondues, cheese-and- charcuterie bar, French-style pizzas baked in wood-burning oven. 30 wines by the glass, full bar. Breakfast, lunch, dinner daily. Pavilion Lounge - Open evenings. Room service is provided by Bar Artisanal. Policies
